guide.introduction: Follow these instructions to assemble the Cricket Loom in preparation for a weaving project.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Follow these instructions to assemble the Cricket Loom in preparation for a weaving project.

Relevant parts
  • Cricket Loom Kit
Tools
  • Hammer
  • Paper clip
  • Phillips screwdriver
  • Ruler

lines.text: Line up the looms sides parallel and with the ratchet dogs on the right and outside the loom.
lines.text_raw: Line up the looms sides parallel and with the ratchet dogs on the right and outside the loom.

lines.text: Place the front and back beams between the sides and secure with the 1-1/2" screws.
lines.text_raw: Place the front and back beams between the sides and secure with the 1-1/2" screws.

lines.text: Working from the outside, insert the non-gear ends of the warp and cloth beams through the holes in the right side of theh loom, then into the holes in the left side of the loom.
lines.text_raw: Working from the outside, insert the non-gear ends of the warp and cloth beams through the holes in the right side of theh loom, then into the holes in the left side of the loom.

lines.text: Place a fender washer on each 1" screw and secure the warp and cloth beams on the left side of the loom.
lines.text_raw: Place a fender washer on each 1" screw and secure the warp and cloth beams on the left side of the loom.

lines.text: Flip the ratchet dogs over so they sit on top of the gears.
lines.text_raw: Flip the ratchet dogs over so they sit on top of the gears.

guide.summary: The Cricket Loom is a tabletop loom produced by the Schacht Spindle Company.
guide.title: Assembling The Cricket Loom
